item.description:
Bob Paster from our group will present a physics theory called TGD and how it relates to the our favorite topic.

From Bob's summary:

Title of talk: Digital Mind Math--Mapping How We Think

Goals of talk:
(1) Explain why some physicists feel that physics research needs to adjust its direction by incorporating the mind.
(2) Explain how University of Helsinki physicist Matti Pitkanen's theory TGD (topological geometrodynamics) gives us a modern physics model of the mind.
(3) Teach how to apply TGD to everyday situations.

A longer summary is in the Files section of this site.

group.name: The Boston Philosophy of Mind Group

item.name: Digital Mind Math
